popt4jlib.PS.FA

Class DblArray1StdChromosomeUpdater

  • java.lang.Object
    • popt4jlib.PS.FA.DblArray1StdChromosomeUpdater
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChromosomeUpdaterIntf

    public class DblArray1StdChromosomeUpdater
extends java.lang.Object
implements ChromosomeUpdaterIntf
    the "standard" implementation of the position update for a firefly towards another, more "bright" one (see Wikipedia article: Firefly_Algorithm).

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011

    Company:

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public java.lang.Object update(java.lang.Object ci,
                      java.lang.Object cj,
                      java.util.Hashtable params)
                        throws OptimizerException
        the main method of the class, requires the following params be present in the params object:
      • <"dfa.chromosomelength", Integer n> mandatory, the dimension of the double[] chromosomes.
      • <"thread.id", Integer id> mandatory, the id of the calling thread; automatically taken care of by the DFAThreadAux class objects.
      • <"dfa.maxallelevalue", Double v> optional, the max. value any element in the double[] chromosomes position can take. Default is +Infinity.
      • <"dfa.minallelevalue", Double v> optional, the min. value any element in the double[] chromosomes position can take. Default is -Infinity.
      • <"dfa.maxalleleval$i$", Double v> optional, the max. value the i-th element in the double[] chromosomes position can take. Default is +Infinity.
      • <"dfa.minallelevalue$i$", Double v> optional, the min. value the i-th element in the double[] chromosomes position can take. Default is -Infinity.
      • <"dfa.beta", Double v> optional, the value of β. Default is 1.0.
      • <"dfa.a0", Double v> optional, the value of a_0. Default is 0.01*L.
      • <"dfa.delta", Double v> optional, the value of δ. Default is 0.97.
Specified by:

Object

  • incrementGeneration

    public void incrementGeneration()
    Description copied from interface: ChromosomeUpdaterIntf
    optional operation, needed only if some kind of "annealing" of the a_t parameters is to take place. Otherwise, may be left as a no-op operation.
    Specified by:
    incrementGeneration in interface ChromosomeUpdaterIntf
